segments.text: Is your turn , Sir . I ‘ m sorry that you have to wait . Saturday is busy day for us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I suppose so . Hair cut , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How so you want to your hair cut ? Any particular way ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d just like to trim . Don ’ t cut too short .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . How about the sideburns ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think they need a little trimming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , don ’ t use them , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you trim off a bit there , about the ear .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t you think it needs about a little taken off and talk to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , yes . That would be better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not that much . And yes , that ’ fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you want to your mustache trimmed ?
segments.speaker: S1
